sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of maltol(MT) on cerebral ischemia and reperfusion damages in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究麥芽醇對大鼠腦缺血再灌注損傷的保護作用。

sentences.english: Red wine contains more resveratrol than white wine.
sentences.chinese: 紅酒含有比白酒更多的白藜醇。

sentences.english: The massecuite thus obtained is then separated into anhydrous crystals of maltitol and mother liquor by conventional separation methods.

sentences.english: Conclusion 70% is the best alcohol concentration of Guizhi Gancao Decoction extracted by SBAE.
sentences.chinese: 結論桂枝甘草湯SBAE法的醇沉濃度以70%爲佳。

sentences.english: A capillary GC method was established for determination of cetyl alcohol and stearyl alcohol in cetostearyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 建立了毛細管GC法測定藥用輔料十六十八醇的含量。

sentences.english: The carbon atomic charge(Qc) on C-O bond described the structural differences among the isomers of aliphatic alcohols and was easy to obtain .
sentences.chinese: 容易獲取，表徵了醇分子同分異構體之間的結構差異。

sentences.english: Therefore, we Choose alcohol extraction of Scutellaria as compatible with Melittin.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，選擇黃芩醇提物作爲與純蜂毒肽配伍的中藥。

sentences.english: REDOX Relationships amongst Alcohols, Aldehydes and Ketones and Carboxylic acids.

sentences.english: White crystal powder, soluble in water and acid, and not soluble in alcohol and other organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 白色結晶或粉末，溶於水和酸，不溶於醇等有機溶劑。

sentences.english: Suggestions are made for the production of furfural alcohol in China.

sentences.english: The influences of the calcinations furnace's structure type on the performance of the integrated methanol catalysts are discussed.

sentences.english: The results of the detection could meet the requirement of the national standard for testing the dicofol residue in foods.

sentences.english: The aim of this paper was to research the antifungal and antioxidant activities of Gelidium amansii.

sentences.english: In greidine " Ingredients like taurine, guarana and inositol or are natural substances."

sentences.english: In the paper, a new method of separating sodium sulphates from bittern by way of ammoniating and alcoholizing has been studied.
